name: Dr. Arun Sharma
bio: Lead ML Engineer at Google with 10+ years experience in NLP and deep learning. PhD from IIT Delhi. Passionate about mentoring the next generation of AI researchers.

name: Priya Patel
bio: Senior Full-Stack Developer at Microsoft. Expert in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Previously founded a successful EdTech startup. Love helping students break into tech.

name: Rajesh Kumar
bio: Principal Data Scientist at Amazon. Specializing in predictive analytics and ML at scale. 8 years experience in e-commerce and fintech domains.

name: Sneha Reddy
bio: Cybersecurity Director at Deloitte. CISSP and CEH certified. Led security programs for Fortune 500 companies. Active speaker at security conferences.

name: Vikram Mehra
bio: Design Lead at Figma. Previously at Uber and Airbnb. Passionate about creating inclusive, accessible design systems. Regular design workshop instructor.

name: Anita Desai
bio: iOS Tech Lead at Apple India. Built apps with millions of downloads. Expert in Swift, SwiftUI, and iOS architecture patterns. Stanford CS graduate.

name: Karthik Nair
bio: Solutions Architect at AWS. 12 years of cloud infrastructure experience. AWS certified (SA Pro, DevOps Pro). Helped 50+ startups scale their infrastructure.

name: Meera Iyer
bio: Group Product Manager at Netflix. Previously PM at Spotify and LinkedIn. Expert in consumer products and growth strategies. MBA from ISB.

name: Arjun Rao
bio: Platform Engineering Lead at Stripe. Expert in Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines. Open source contributor and tech blogger.

name: Deepika Singh
bio: Blockchain Architect at Polygon. Early Ethereum contributor. Built DeFi protocols managing $100M+ TVL. Focused on Web3 education.
